group.label: BioPackExpress
group.vc: exists('BPexpress_gui','parameter'):$e if ( $e>0) then if (BPexpress_gui>0) then BPexpress_gui=2 endif endif
group.vc2: exists('BPexpress_gui','parameter'):$e if ( $e>0) then if (BPexpress_gui>0) then BPexpress_gui=1 endif endif
group.show: $SHOW=0 exists('BPexpress_gui','parameter'):$e if ( $e>0) then if (BPexpress_gui>0) then $SHOW=1 endif endif

group.label: Express process
group.show: $SHOW=0 exists('sampling','parameter','processed'):$es if ($es>0.5) then getvalue('sampling','processed'):$s if ($s<>'sparse') then $SHOW=1 endif endif

textmessage.label: current experiment C13observe_BB is set as: C13 1D
textmessage.vq: nuc_obs nuc_ni nuc_ni2 ni ni2 phase phase2 customflag cppauseflg sampling
textmessage.set: $smsg= ' ' calcdim if (arraydim>1) then if (sampling='sparse') then $smsg=', non-uniform sampling' else $smsg=', uniform sampling' endif endif BPexpress_guess_dimensions:$msg $VALUE='current experiment '+ seqfil + ' is set as: ' + $msg + $smsg

button.label: Acquire
button.vc: if (sampling='sparse') then CSschedule endif if (arraydim=1) then ga else go endif exists('ni','parameter'):$e if ($e>0.5) then vnmrjcmd('pnew','ni') endif

button.label: C13 1D
button.vc: exists('ni','parameter'):$e if ( ($e>0) ) then ni=0 phase=1 endif exists('ni2','parameter'):$e2 if ( ($e2>0) ) then ni2=0 phase2=1 endif time
